import React from 'react' const [inputVal, setInput] = useState({ name: "", branch: "", dob: "", email: "", mobile: "", address: "" }) const setData = (e) => { const {name, value} = e.target; setInput((preval) => { return ({ ...preval, [name]:value }) }) } const Update = () => { return (
HOME
); }; export default Update
